mapper.sql: ORDER_ID, USER_NAME, PERSON_ID, MOBILE, ADDRESS, CREATE_TIME, SOURCE, PERSON_ADDRESS, YY_NO, TAOCAN_NAME, MSG, STATUS, PHONE_NUMBER, EXTEND1, EXTEND2, EXTEND3, EXTEND4,EXTEND5,EXTEND6
mapper.delete: delete from yy_order_ks where status in ('2','3')
delete from yy_order_ks where STR_TO_DATE ( CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE ( '2016-01-01 00:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AND STR_TO_DATE ( #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %T' )
mapper.select:
select
from yy_order_ks where status in ('2','3')

select
from yy_order_ks where status not in ('2','3') and STR_TO_DATE ( CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE ( '2016-01-01 00:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) AND STR_TO_DATE ( #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %T' )
mapper.insert: insert into yy_order_ks (ORDER_ID, USER_NAME, PERSON_ID, MOBILE, ADDRESS, CREATE_TIME, SOURCE, PERSON_ADDRESS, YY_NO, TAOCAN_NAME, MSG, STATUS, PHONE_NUMBER, EXTEND1, EXTEND2, EXTEND3, EXTEND4) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{personAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taocanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extend4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update yy_order_ks
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PERSON_ADDRESS = #{personAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YY_NO = #{yyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TAOCAN_NAME = #{taocanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MSG = #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTEND1 = #{extend1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTEND2 = #{extend2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTEND3 = #{extend3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTEND4 = #{extend4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTEND5 = #{extend5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTEND6 = #{extend6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
